sentences.english: Thou therefore, O LORD God of hosts, the God of Israel, awake to visit all the heathen: be not merciful to any wicked transgressors.
sentences.chinese: 萬軍之神耶和華以色列的神阿，求你興起，懲治萬邦。

sentences.english: And In Jonah, He is the Great Foreign Missionary that takes the Word of God into all of the world.
sentences.chinese: 在約拿書，他是偉大的宣教士，把神的話帶到萬邦。

sentences.english: Tang period, the IMC to North Korea, kickball Conference was held in a grand palace.
sentences.chinese: 盛唐時期，萬邦來朝，蹴鞠大會在皇宮內盛大舉行。

sentences.english: He desires people from all nations will acknowledge him as king and worship him.
sentences.chinese: 神要在萬民中爲王，要人從萬邦萬國來敬拜祂。

definition: Changping, place name in Gaoping County 高平縣|高平县, southern Shanxi, the scene of the great battle of 262-260 BC between Qin and Zhao
an order (esp. army)/bugle call expressing military order/verbal command
that being the case/then/in that case
(Confucianism) rites and music (the means of regulating society)
